name: Daemonical
description: Having ended up on an remote and abandoned island, you find yourself in a life and death battle against an evil coming straight from perdition. With each of your four friends possibly being a bone chilling demonic entity that will try to slaughter the rest of the group - who can you trust?
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with DirectX 10 capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
